document.full_text: the marvell technology group gave a positive earnings forecast and said sales of smartphone chips in china were beginning to improve, setting off an 11 percent gain in its share price.
document.title: business briefing | telecom: earnings outlook lifts shares of marvell technology
lines_and_colors: the marvell technology group gave a positive earnings forecast and said sales of smartphone chips in china were beginning to improve, setting off an 11 percent gain in its share price.
